data.actual_result: it sais: "set the welcome message to #null"
data.expected_result: entry should tell us the ID of the channel
data.short_description: [Audit Log] setting the welcome message to a channel and deleting the channel afterwards lets the welcome message entry show #null instead of Channel ID
data.steps_to_repro: - set the welcome message to a channel - delete that channel - observe welcome message entry in audit log
